title: Practice-Based Education Program in Health Systems Science

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and public health concepts
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education modeled after a patient linkage program developed during the COVID-19 pandemic, enhancing problem-solving experiences in healthcare systems through learner-instructor collaboration

learning_goals: Explain the linkage mechanism between medical and social issues through actual patient case analysis
Analyze patient data using an Electronic Medical Record (EMR) system and perform the process of connecting healthcare resources
Propose three or more practical suggestions for improving the healthcare system
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
